OOC: It's okay

BIC:

Yggdrasil: This means I'm not invited, right? That's good for me. Tell 
me when I'm allowed out, okay?

He sits down in the spot and brings up a holoprojected solitaire game.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> OOC: Correct me if I'm wrong, I'm assuming he's on the move here.
> 
> Gatara holds up a finger.  "Not so fast, Maximal.  Computer, 
activate 
> containment protocol alpha!"  'Containment protocal alpha' means the 
> computer takes advantage of projectors located throughout the ship 
to 
> trap all non-Rogues aboard in unbreakable force fields.  The fields 
> deactivate only on a voice command from a Rogue of equal or higher 
> rank to the one who triggered them in the first place.
> 
> This means Yggdrasil now has about a foot to move in any given 
> direction.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Yggdrasil: Better I tag along, I figure. Maybe Devilcat has 
decided 
> > something concerning me.
> > 
> > He wasn't very hot at the idea, since he did feel as some sort of 
> > prisoner. Hell, it was his fault right from the start. One thing 
he 
> > had not inherited from Prime was a certain sense of diplomacy. His 
> > machine guns talked louder anyways.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > Gatara thinks for a minute.  "Well, I didn't see anyone like 
that 
> at 
> > > the last major battle, but that could be for any number of 
> reasons."
> > > 
> > > She is interrupted by Devilcat's signal.  "Oh shoot, we're going 
> to 
> > > have to cut this conversation short."  She rises to her feet, 
but 
> > > appears reluctant to go.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > Yggdrasil: Yeah, but the fact is I don'y even know where Talos 
> is, 
> > > or 
> > > > even if he's alive right now. Got any clue?
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > > "I see," Gatara muses.  "We're in much the same boat - until 
> we 
> > > get 
> > > > > our engines repaired, this is just a fancy apartment 
complex."
> > > > >
